Talon:

"I bet that Perceptor could tell us more about Hydras than he had told 
us"said Talon"He had behaved... quite trustful so far, If i remember he was 
telling something about Nightlight, just before we leave."

-----Original Message----- 
From: Sandy
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 2010 10:46 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The Awakening

Tucson nodds, but then something else comes into mind.  He had felt a great 
power within him, and with Rodimus there, he felt it even more.  He puts a 
hand on his chest.

"Hmmm?  This is strange, ever since we've been talking here together, I 
sense an increase of power in my spark..  I wonder...  Rodimus your plan is 
fail safe, but something inside me is trying to tell me that we should stick 
together...   Almost as if...."

Straight Shot transforms and lands between them.

"Power link.  That's the word you're trying to get out Tucson, Powerlink. 
Y'know?  It's when two Autobots transform and merge into one highly powerful 
warrior.  You guys are both Primes, and I bet you two can power link. 
That's what that little voice inside you is telling you Tucson.  And that'll 
explain the power increaes you feel, whenever you're with Rodimus.  Well, 
that's if it is possible, not sure though..  Just think imagine what you 
guys could accomplish if you could do that?  And Rodimus could become your 
eyes and you can become his strength.  And since sometimes you guys have 
different views, you can share them when you're linked together.  And the 
more you share, the more well rounded you become.  Knowledge is power, and 
that's one thing we got that Hydras doesn't have."

Tucson turns his head toward Rodimus.

"I - I have never tried that...  That's up to you if you wish to attempt it, 
Rodimus.."

Rat Trap steps in.

"You're missn' out on a power play if ya don't try it.  Flatten Hydras, 
stomp out those big bad bugs...  Powerlinking will give you guys the umph 
it's gonna take ta take ta not only exterminate those overgrown pests, but 
it'll really put Hydras in his place."

Tucson turns to Rat Trap.

" A power play huh?  I'm willing to try it, but Rodimus has to also agree to 
something like this.  It's not something I can do without his permission."

Rat Trap nodds.

"Atta boy Wheels.  And I can't think of anyone else who'd make a powerful 
statement other than you guys."

Tucson turns his head to Rodimus and waits for his reply.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> Rodimus shook his head slighly as he turned to leave the room, his
> strides long and purposeful. "There are so many things to deal with at
> once." He said as he walked, his face firm and resolute. "At them
> moment we have our two objectives, locating and defeating Hydras as
> well as learning more information about the Insect creatures that we
> have just encountered."
>
> Rodimus turned and looked at the others that had followed him out of
> the room. He gestured expansively with his his left hand as he
> continued to hold Elita in his right arm. They had all come to a stop
> in a large chamber, the bridge was just a litle ahead of them. Cheetor
> and Lord Elder also made thier way over to joim the group.
>
> "Tuscon, since you are a Prime now and I am sure you are eager to
> revisit yourself on Hydras, whoch will leave me to focus on the
> insectoids." Rodimus smiled grimly as he tapped his head meaningfully.
> "I believe that even though they have been able to learn much of us
> Maximals and Autobots from what was stored in my head, I believe that
> they left a few tid bits in my head as well."
